translations: 吹奏（blow 的过去式或过去分词）
吹（blow 的过去式或过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Somehow it seems to me that the wind--the wind blowed the--the-- Try harder, Tom!
sentences.translation: 在我看来，风——风吹灭了——吹灭了——再加把劲，汤姆！

sentences.sentence: He started to cry: I haven't blowed it yet.
sentences.translation: 王初初大哭道：我还没吹呢。
